sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'exp', templateUrl: './exp.component.html', styleUrls: ['./exp.component.css'], }) export class ExpComponent { openCity(evt: Event, cityName: string): void { let i: number; let tabcontent: HTMLCollectionOf = document.getElementsByClassName('tabcontent'); for (i = 0; i < tabcontent.length; i++) { (tabcontent[i] as HTMLElement).style.display = 'none'; } let tablinks: HTMLCollectionOf = document.getElementsByClassName('tablinks'); for (i = 0; i < tablinks.length; i++) { (tablinks[i] as HTMLElement).className = ( tablinks[i] as HTMLElement ).className.replace(' active', ''); } (document.getElementById(cityName) as HTMLElement).style.display = 'block'; (evt.currentTarget as HTMLElement).className += ' active'; } // Get the element with id="defaultOpen" and click on it //document.getElementById("defaultOpen")!.click(); }
Experience
  • Senior Software Developer | Capgemini India
    Jul 2021 to Present
  • Collaborating with the team for the past 2 years to understand business requirements and practicing the development, testing and deployment in parallel, as part of scrum/agile methodology .
  • Contributing towards the development of modifications of the live website using Angular 12.
  • Able to solve problems and build logics from scratch.
  • Developed and presented work to audiences including senior executives and stakeholders.
  • Exposure in working with US as well as Australian clients.
  • Web Development Intern | Cloud Counselege
    Apr 2020 to Jul 2020
  • Creation of a live project divided into 7 weeks of tasks which in turn result into perfect project.
  • Collected, defined and translated user requirements into project designs and implementation plans.
